snippet.title: Otaku Simulator ~ New School - Pathfinding Test
snippet.description:
#AnimeGame #GameDev #AnimeSchoolGame #jrpg #rpg #games #gamemaking #development #gamedevelopment #gamedeveloper #videogame#gaming #anime #blender #blender3d #architecture #indiegame #indiegamedev #stealthgame #animegame 

Just small video where i test pathfinding of npc in new school, it will take a moment to remade all exactely like old school but i would try :)

You can download Otaku Simulator on 
https://gamejolt.com/games/otakusim/398760

You can download on Itch Io
https://blueflamegames.itch.io/otaku-simulator

You can join the Discord of the game 
https://discord.gg/PNJ6seCHPq

Check Haruna Song on Spotify 
https://open.spotify.com/track/0dxtiIqSy2tGFt1L5Wgzf0?si=8eee5384b55e42bc

And thanks you for viewing this video

-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
Please watch: "Boss Fight of my Indie Game - [DEVLOG]" 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W54rcMhTzaA
-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
